data.text: Delayed again! @tlrailuk needs to sort out their scheduling.
Unbelievable! The doors on @tlrailuk train didn't open, had to wait for the next train.
Why are the toilets always out of order on @tlrailuk trains?
Completely unprofessional staff at @tlrailuk today. Very disappointed!
@tlrailuk train was so overcrowded this morning, it was unbearable.
Air conditioning not working on a hot day in @tlrailuk train, just great!
Got charged twice for my ticket on @tlrailuk. Need a refund asap!
Had a pleasant journey with @tlrailuk today. Everything was on time!
Really appreciate the helpful staff at @tlrailuk. Made my journey easier.
Toilet was not working, that is terrible
Enjoyed the scenic route on my @tlrailuk trip today. Highly recommend!
